bibl.title: with contributions by W. CLARYSSE, R.W. DANIEL, F.A.J. DE HAAS, N. KRUIT, K. VANDORPE, B. VERBEECK and by C. GALLAZZI and J.D. THOMAS, Papyri, Ostraca, Parchments and Waxed Tablets in the Leiden Papyrological Institute.
bibl.seg: HOOGENDIJK F.A.J. and P. VAN MINNEN (edited by), with contributions by W. CLARYSSE, R.W. DANIEL, F.A.J. DE HAAS, N. KRUIT, K. VANDORPE, B. VERBEECK and by C. GALLAZZI and J.D. THOMAS, Papyri, Ostraca, Parchments and Waxed Tablets in the Leiden Papyrological Institute. (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXV.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1991, 4°, xiii-315 pp., figg., tabl. et 43 pll. Hfl. 250.

C.R. par Jean Gascou, BibO 51 (1994) coll. 333-337 (reproduit coll. 551-555). - Ann Ellis Hanson, BASP 30 (1993) pp. 165-172, 1 fig. - Paul Heilporn, AntCl 62 (1993) pp. 442-443. - Alain Martin, ChrEg 68 (1993) Nos 135-136, pp. 265-268. - Günter Poethke, ArchPF 39 (1993) pp. 85-87. - Alain Touwaide, Scriptorium 46 (1992) pp. 136*-137*. - Edmond Van 't Dack, RHD 60 (1992) pp. 185-187. - Heinz Heinen, Gnomon 70 (1998) pp. 553-555.
Hoogendijk van Minnen Clarysse Daniel de Haas Kruit Vandorpe Verbeeck Gallazzi Thomas
